title: Vault Lesson Index Generation Issue
details: User reported that lesson index pages in Obsidian vault are not showing expected content fields (Videos, Readings, etc.) in the body after implementing AddLessonLevelContent method. Vault root is at C:\Users\danshue.REDMOND\Vault\01_Projects\MBA\. Code changes were made to VaultIndexContentGenerator.cs to prioritize content over navigation for lesson-level folders (hierarchyLevel >= 6), but the generated output is not displaying as expected in Obsidian.
